评论概述: Comfy sweater for casual at home, or out and about
评论详情: When I received this sweater it was vacuum packed and a bit rigid.  I put it into the washing machine with regular detergent and fabric softener on a delicate setting.  I then time dried it on delicate for 15 minutes.  Once damp dry, I hung it to finish drying on a padded hanger.  The outcome was a softer, huggable utility sweater that can keep me comfortable throughout my busy day, at home, or on the go.  The neutral color I chose will work with formal and informal pants and tops.  Since this is a gift, I feel confident, my friend will enjoy this sweater for many seasons to come.
it is over sized but very nice

It's made of acrylic I should not have purchased this item. Plus I got brown and it's just bad like why did I buy this.  If you are in a room temp set to 75°F you will be roasting in this. Another con you can't just put it in the washer. Bad bad judgement on my part. Don't waste your money.

评论概述: Overall good value for the price
评论详情: This is an attractively designed, comfy and roomy sweater.  The sleeves are long but the cuff can be rolled if you don't mind a bit of seam showing. I didn't pay attention to the fact that it has no buttons and on occasion I miss being able to button it.  It is acrylic and for that reason it pills very easily but it's fine for wearing around the house. For this price it's adequate.  If you are looking for a sweater to wear out or to the office you will want something made of a better yarn that doesn't pill.

I got an xl because I wanted it to be long and cover my butt. I just had a baby so I wanted something cozy and comfy. But it’s just extra wide and clunky and make me look 10x bigger and still doesn’t cover my butt. I’m just under 5’8”.
Amazing quality and I cant keep mu daughters from stealing it to wear also! Def glad I bought this sweater!!
I love this sweater
I work in a freezer and love wearing this over my shirts. It’s very thick and definitely worth the price. Would buy again
This sweater is so beautiful……cozy and soft and warm. I’m very happy with this purchase!
Fits nice with roomy pockets. Quality is good.
Too bulky and not soft
Comfy, and have more than. You can’t go wrong. True to size. Enjoy!

The sweater is in no way oversized. I like my sweaters to be big on me so I always buy large sizes and that's what I ordered with this one. When it arrived I opened it right away and was surprised by the weight of the sweater. I tried it on and was immediately annoyed by how much shorter it is than what the picture shows.  The material is in no way soft and cozy, more like just shy of being scratchy. The pockets are the weirdest part of this item. They have these horrible, long, single pieces of thread holding the two corners of the pockets to the sweater on the inside which I  can already tell will not survive regular wear. Overall, it's a far cry from a "stylish" sweater like the tag boasts, more like poorly designed trash. Will never buy from this brand again.
It was a gift for my daughter. She loves it.
loved the fit and the softness

A little oversized as it’s suppose to be, super comfy and stylish.

This sweater was very comfortable and warm. I would definitely recommend.

I love this cardigan! I bought a black one for work, the quality and ability to keep me warm was so great I bought 2 more for myself and one for my mom! They do come vacuum packed and there is a bit of a strange factory kind of smell to them so I would suggest washing before wearing to get rid of the wrinkles and smell and then hanging to dry instead of putting in the dryer. I love that they're not too bulky but can still keep you warm. I wear the black one every day at work. There is some pilling at the wrist part of the arms already but like I said, I wear it everyday. I will definitely buy these again as the current ones wear out.
